article:
The driver had to stop his car soon after setting out from a country village to drive to London.21 _  a strange noise from the back of the car,he got out to have a look.He   _   the wheels   _   ,but as he found nothing   _   ,he continued on his way.The noise began almost immediately and it was now louder  _   ever.Quickly  _  his head,the man saw   _   appeared to be a great black cloud    following    the car.When he stopped at a village    later on   he was told that a queen bee   might be hidden   in his car as there were thousands of bees nearby.
  On learning it,the man    _   that the only    _    to escape would be to drive away as33 _  as possible.After an hour's hard driving, he arrived in London    _   he stopped his car outside a hotel and went in to have a drink.Before long a customer who had seen him arrive    _    in to tell him that his car was   _   with bees.The   _    driver telephoned the police and explained what happened.The police decided that the best way to    deal with  the situation would be to call a beekeeper.
  In a short time,the beekeeper arrived.He found the unwelcome passenger hidden near the wheels at the back of the car.Very     _   for this unexpected gift,the beekeeper took the queen and her thousands of followers home in a large box. And the driver drove away in peace, at last  _  from the black cloud which had hung over his car.
